vote.title: Authorize acquisition of eight street easements containing a total of approximately 14,708 square feet located near the intersection of Edd Road and Spicewood Drive for the Edd Road from Seagoville Road to Garden Grove Drive Project (list attached to the Agenda Information Sheet) - Not to exceed $134,288.00 ($110,290.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $23,998.00) - Financing: Street and Transportation (A) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund)
